XXahovk2_u:45_5: tatra ekasmin dine nāganāginī nāgau tatra ṛṣim ekaṃ daṃśitavān tata ṛṣiḥ sarpadaṃśitavedanāṃ vedayan śapitavān /
XXahovk2_u:45_8: tato nāgīnāgau śapitamātreṇa sapta śambukā janmāntare babhūvuḥ /
XXahovk2_u:45_9: evaṃ paribhramyamāne śambukā nāgajanme nityaṃ caityadarśanayā pūrvajanmavṛttiṃ smṛtavatyo babhūva /
XXahovk2_u:45_10: kasmiṃś cit caityabhaktaṛṣidaṃśitenāham itthaṃ śambukājanmam anubhūtaṃ vyākulībhūtam /
XXahovk2_u:45_11: tataḥ kṣetre dhānyastambakaṃ caityam iti smṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ paribhramanti /
XXahovk2_u:46_0: Avk_P_26. tataś caturthakena dinena śambukā kīrakīrtir nāma mahārājasya saptakanyakā janmapratilabdhā babhūvuḥ /
XXahovk2_u:46_2: tāḥ saptakanyakās tapova ....... sadā puṣpavarṣāḥ patanti / evaṃ vividhā api kṛtvā divyapuṣpavimāne dhṛtvā sukhāvatīlokadhātau nīyante /
XXahovk2_u:47_2: tuṣitabhavanavāsī satsubhāso mahātmā kalimalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ dārayitvā tatra sarvavibhavasukham atulyaṃ prāptavān /
XXahovk2_u:47_3: bhāgadheyaṃ bhavati sugatasūtraṃ śrāvayed yas tu dharmyam /
XXahovk2_u:47_4: tataḥ sabhājanāḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare svasvasthānam anugacchanti /
